locations.Deku Baba Nuts:
is_adult or Slingshot or Sticks or 
                has_explosives or Kokiri_Sword or can_use(Dins_Fire)

exits.Deku Tree Lobby:
transition('Deku Tree T01', 'Deku Tree Room 01 Enemies'
                or 'Deku Tree Room 01 T01 Unbar')
exits.Deku Tree 2F Room:
transition('Deku Tree T06', 'Deku Tree Room 01 Enemies'
                or 'Deku Tree Room 01 T06 Unbar')

locations.Deku Tree GS Basement Vines:
can_use_projectile or can_use(Dins_Fire) or
                (logic_deku_basement_gs and (is_adult or Sticks or Kokiri_Sword))
locations.Deku Baba Nuts:
is_adult or Slingshot or Sticks or 
                has_explosives or Kokiri_Sword or can_use(Dins_Fire)

exits.Deku Tree Basement Hint Scrub Room:
(here(has_fire_source or
                (can_climb(60) and can_press_floor_switch and
                    (can_use(Sticks) or can_use(Bow)))))
                and transition('Deku Tree T03', True)
exits.Deku Tree Basement River Room Ledge:
can_climb(60) and
                (at('Deku Tree Basement River Room Ledge', True)
                    or here(logic_deku_b1_skip or can_climb(85)))

region_name: Deku Tree Basement River Room Ledge

locations.Deku Baba Nuts:
is_adult or Slingshot or Sticks or 
                has_explosives or Kokiri_Sword or can_use(Dins_Fire)

exits.Deku Tree Basement Back Room: is_child and transition('Deku Tree T12', True)
exits.Deku Tree Three Scrub Room:
(here(has_fire_source or
                (can_climb(60) and can_press_floor_switch and
                    (can_use(Sticks) or (logic_deku_b1_webs_with_bow and can_use(Bow))))))
                and transition('Deku Tree T11', True)

region_name: Deku Tree Basement Hint Scrub Room

exits.Deku Tree Spiked Log Room East:
transition('Deku Tree T09', here(can_use(Slingshot) or can_use(Bow))
                or 'Deku Tree Room 04 T09 Unbar')

region_name: Deku Tree Spiked Log Room East
Deku Tree Spiked Log Room West

exits.Deku Tree Torch Deku Baba Room: can_climb(60) and transition('Deku Tree T02', True)

region_name: Deku Tree Torch Deku Baba Room

is_adult or Slingshot or Sticks or 
                has_explosives or Kokiri_Sword or can_use(Dins_Fire)

exits.Deku Tree Spiked Log Room West:
transition('Deku Tree T02', here(has_fire_source_with_torch or can_use(Bow))
                or 'Deku Tree Room 06 T02 Unbar')
exits.Deku Tree Basement Back Room:
transition('Deku Tree T08', here(has_fire_source_with_torch or can_use(Bow))
                or 'Deku Tree Room 06 T08 Unbar')

locations.Deku Baba Nuts:
is_adult or Slingshot or Sticks or 
                has_explosives or Kokiri_Sword or can_use(Dins_Fire)

exits.Deku Tree Basement River Room Ledge:
here(has_fire_source_with_torch or can_use(Bow)) and is_child
                and transition('Deku Tree T12', True)
exits.Deku Tree Gold Skulltula Room:
here((has_fire_source_with_torch or can_use(Bow)) and can_blast_or_smash)
                and transition('Deku Tree T04', True)

exits.Gohma Entrance:
transition('Deku Tree T05', 'Deku Tree Room 09 Enemies'
                or 'Deku Tree Room 09 T05 Unbar')

locations.Deku Baba Nuts:
is_adult or Slingshot or Sticks or 
                has_explosives or Kokiri_Sword or can_use(Dins_Fire)
